content.raw:
`UNIT_MainWindow_TEST` is failing:
~~~
$ gazebo/gui/UNIT_MainWindow_TEST 
********* Start testing of MainWindow_TEST *********
Config: Using QTest library 4.8.6, Qt 4.8.6
PASS   : MainWindow_TEST::initTestCase()
QWARN  : MainWindow_TEST::Selection() QObject::connect: Cannot connect (null)::DeleteSignal(const std::string &) to gazebo::gui::ModelCreator::OnDelete(const std::string &)
FAIL!  : MainWindow_TEST::Selection() 'vis' returned FALSE. ()
   Loc: [/home/scpeters/ws/gazebo4/src/gazebo/gazebo/gui/MainWindow_TEST.cc(68)]
SharePercentChange[0.855256] ShareMaxPercentChange[2]
ResPercentChange[2.05581]ResMaxPercentChange[5]
QFATAL : MainWindow_TEST::UserCameraFPS() Received signal 11
FAIL!  : MainWindow_TEST::UserCameraFPS() Received a fatal error.
   Loc: [Unknown file(0)]
Totals: 1 passed, 2 failed, 0 skipped
********* Finished testing of MainWindow_TEST *********
Aborted (core dumped)
~~~
